#include <stdio.h>

void freq(long long *num,long long *pr);

int main()
{
  long long num[110001] = {0},pr[100000] = {0}, i, j, k = 1;

  num[0] = num[1] = 1;
  
  i = 2;

  while(i * i < 110000)
  {
    if(num[i])
    {
      i++;
      continue;
    }

    j = i + i;

    while(j < 110001)
    {
      num[j] = 1;
      j += i;
    }
    
    i++;
  }

  for(i = 0 ; i < 110001 ; i++)
  {
    if(!num[i])
    {
      num[i] = k;
      pr[k++] = i;
    }
    else
    {
      num[i] = 0;
    }  
  }
  
  freq(num,pr);
  
  return 0;
}

void freq(long long *num,long long *pr)
{
  long long test, n, k, j, i;
  long long sum = 0;

  scanf("%lld", &test);

  while(test--)
  {
    scanf(" %lld%lld",&n,&k);
    
    i = n ;
    sum = 0;
    
    while(!num[i])
     i--;
    
    j = num[i];
    
    if(k == 0)
    { 
      sum  =  (n - 1) * n / 2;
      printf("%lld\n",sum);
      continue;
    }  
    else if( k > j)
    {
      printf("0\n");
      continue;
    }  
     
    sum = n - pr[k] + 1;

    for(i = 2 ; i + k - 1 <= j ; i++)
    {
      sum += (n - pr[i + k - 1] + 1) * (pr[i] - pr[i - 1]);
    }  
    
    printf("%lld\n",sum);
 }

 return ;
}
